name: Porchetta Sandwich
keywords: Porchetta, Sandwich, Italian Cuisine, Pork, Pork Belly, Rocket, Arugula, Onion Relish, Lemon Mayo, Bread, Main Course, Quick Meal, Easy Recipe, Savory, Meat, Lunch, Dinner, Panini, Ciabatta, Rustic Bread
description: A flavorful Porchetta Sandwich featuring succulent slices of porchetta, fresh rocket, sweet onion relish, and zesty lemon mayo, all nestled in delicious bread. A delightful Italian-inspired main course perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.

recipeInstructions.text: For the lemon mayo, mix some lemon zest, lemon juice and mayo together until you get a wonderfully lemony mayo.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep the mayo

recipeInstructions.text: Stack the sandwich with all your ingredients and make sure you get some thick slices of porchetta!
recipeInstructions.name: Stack the sandwich

notes: Easy and fantastic way of having porchetta. Also really great with salsa verde, really brings an explosion of flavors to the mix, not that you really need it but still!
